summary: A divorced mother faces the bitter irony of being suspected of child abuse when in fact her own teen son is taking verbal and physical swipes at her.
cast: Delta Burke|Ryan Merriman|Vyto Ruginis|Marc Donato|Barclay Hope|Rosemary Dunsmore|Deborah Odell|Richard Zeppieri|Tamsin Kelsey|Dan Petronijevic|Asia Vieira|Patricia Wanstall|Jonathan Payne|Linda Salkeld|Ari Cohen|Shannon Hile|Johnie Chase|Paulino Nunes|Lubomir Mykytiuk|Jonathan Walker|Elizabeth Saunders|Jean Daigle|Sanjay Talwar|James Carroll|Bernard Browne|Eve Crawford|Brenda Robins|John Watson|Sean Provencher|Jeffrey Akomah|Jordan Barker|Christopher Tuah|Francisca Zentilli|Tom Redman|Jane Luk
keywords: tragic event|woman slaps a man in the face|tearing a necklace from someone's neck|physical|divorced mother
title: Hijos de la violencia
